reviewtext: If you just need to connect a router or switch, and don't want to bother about making your own cables, this is a great option. Certainly pricey for what it is, but the snagless design is very solid and you won't have to worry about bad cables, as these are all pre-checked for you.One small quibble is that the snagless housing makes for a big cable end, which could become problematic if you are plugging many cables into a small hub. Otherwise, great.
summary: High quality cable, but you might want to roll your own
